comment._content: Hi, I'm an admin for a group called VINTAGE COMMERCIAL AND MUNICIPAL VEHICLES, and we'd love to have this added to the group!

comment.author: 37220118@N02
comment._content: That’s a great shot of 34th Street! We'd love to have it in our official group for the area, including Herald & Greeley Square Parks, 34th Street NYC. If you're interested, please join the group and submit your photos. Thanks!
